name: Forced Servitude (V)
Lore: 'The Empire often uses droids for nefarious purposes. Imperials compel droids to do jobs that are repugnant to humans. An automaton has no ethical conscience.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your troopers are Heroic. Opponent''s total weapon destiny targeting your Heroic cards is +2. When opponent is about to remove their last card from Life Force, you may first place all your troopers in Used Pile (last card must still be removed). (Immune to Alter.)',
